messages.body:
$TSLA too bad!

https://www.google.com/amp/s/seekingalpha.com/amp/article/4150487-tesla-10-k-going-concern-disclosures

links.title: Tesla, Its 10-K And 'Going Concern' Disclosures
links.description: Back in January, I wrote that a new accounting rule related to going concern qualifications would likely have a big impact on Tesla ( TSLA). Recall that generally accepted accounting principles, or GAAP, require financial statements to be prepared under the assumption that the business will remain a "going concern."
